message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $9,500. I think it would be very valuable to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I understand your position, Bob, but $9,500 is already a very competitive price for this product.  How about we settle at $9,000?
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. How about we settle at $8,750?
